scripts.prod: bun run zip:chrome && bun run zip:firefox
scripts.zip:chrome: BROWSER=chrome vite build --mode production && bun scripts/zip.js --browser=chrome
scripts.zip:firefox: BROWSER=firefox vite build --mode production && bun scripts/zip.js --browser=firefox
scripts.test: bun run scripts/build-tests.js && bun test test.local
scripts.test:watch: bun run scripts/watch-tests.js && bun test test.local
